Engine.​src.​logic.​Behavior
[XmlRoot("Behavior")]
[Serializable]
public abstract
Engine.​src.​logic.​Behavior
Engine.​src.​logic.​behavior.​SolidBody

Attached to a GameObject, it will rule its behaviour and manage different behaviours when differents part of its Hitbox intersects with something else.
